meanings.definition: A system of working a set number of hours with the starting and finishing times chosen within agreed limits by the employee.
meanings.sent1: At the company, employees enjoy flextime, allowing them to choose when they start and finish work.
meanings.sent2: Flextime is a popular policy in many workplaces, giving employees more control over their schedules.
meanings.sent3: The office jokester tried to convince his boss that flextime meant he could work only during his favorite hours - lunch and happy hour.
meanings.sent4: In the world of flextime, the clock is not the enemy but a flexible friend that bends to the will of the worker.
meanings.sent5: Flextime is like a magic wand that lets employees tailor their work hours to fit their lives perfectly.
